subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Carey Price made 21 saves and Max Pacioretty had two goals and an assist as the Montreal Canadiens beat the visiting Philadelphia Flyers, 5-1, to end a six-game losing streak.
snippet: Carey Price made 21 saves and Max Pacioretty had two goals and an assist as the Montreal Canadiens beat the visiting Philadelphia Flyers, 5-1, to end a six-game losing streak.
